Html:
I would like to share the encoding process for QR code that I have discovered so far by reading ZXing's code and ISO/IEC document. So people could read and give feed back. Also I have list some issue we currently have. Those issue you won't notice from QR-CodeControl, as it is still under ZXing code wrapper. Thus this is just for development reference. 

 

Here is document link. 

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1fpxe6Ex9WNTx7kCsm8zlgDNiqNcc_sB9U8n3oJqOHLI/edit

 

Also for future decode part. I have found this framework. It might be useful, I will list it here for future reference.  It's C# AI framework, and it has a lot of image process and detection function. It should be useful to detect un-expect or damaged QR code picture. 

http://www.aforgenet.com/framework/projects.html
